page.title: 20HELPERS FOR THE PROJECT
page.content: Mr.L. Walker and Mr. B.Hamer are indebted to the following people for their help in completing The Domesday Project.The Rev.Frank Rumball who came into the school to talk about the history of Eye Church.Mr.Harold Fitter for his interesting talk on the restoration of the bells at Eye Ch. Mr.Harry Conod for his talk on local agriculture and Lord Cawley for the information on Berrington Hall.We should also like to thank the following parents who have taken the children out to do the Land Use Survey and the Amenities Count:Mrs.J.Garrett, Mrs.L.McLaurin, Mrs.J.Kent, Mrs.M.Lloyd, Mrs.B.Wills, Mrs.J.Bray, Mrs.H.Walker, Mrs.P.Pearce, Mrs.R.Alwright, Mrs.M.Walker, Mrs.B.Fletcher, Mrs.S.Strutt, Mrs.K.Boardman and Mr.R.Poole AND THE CHILDREN OF LUSTON SCHOOL.
